text: 2:8 Jop 4:9; Aisaia 11:4; Daniel 7:10; Hibru 10:27; Akar Mogomem 19:15Egh Godɨn Araziba adoghodozir gumazir kam dughiar kamɨn azenim giram. Eghtɨ Ekiam Iesus uan akamɨn a giveragh a mɨsueghtɨma an aremegham. Ekiam uan angazangarim ko gavgavir ekiam sara izɨva, uan angazangarim ko gavgavir kamra a gumazir kam bar a gasɨghasɨgham.
